name: Sherpak Boat Roller
description: An easier way to cartop your boat at the end of the day when your arm strength is done. Great for solo paddlers, the heavy-duty suction cups mount reliably to car tops or glass, and offer a quick rolling surface to slide your boat into position.Suction cups grip glass or metal surfaces.2 mounting angles are compatible with most vehicles.Closed-cell foam cradles boat during loading.Dimensions are 6.75in. upright height, or 2.75in. at 90 degrees. Width is 27in.
